name: Captain! (lukepuke)
description:
Take first person control in the gripping, realistic space fighter sim, Captain. Battle through hoards of enemy space craft in awe inspiring, mind bending, space shuttle dog fights. Keep an eye on your ammo and fuel levels, and try to avoid any further innocents lives lost in the wake of your awesome space-battles!

(This is a demo version, full game coming soon, maybe)

Controls:

Control the captains hand with the mouse, control the ship with the panel infront of you.
